thread.title: Donald Glover & James Earl Jones Cast As Simba And Mufasa In New 'Lion King' Movie | 92.1 The Beat
thread.title_full: Donald Glover & James Earl Jones Cast As Simba And Mufasa In New 'Lion King' Movie | 92.1 The Beat

title: Donald Glover & James Earl Jones Cast As Simba And Mufasa In New 'Lion King' Movie | 92.1 The Beat
text:
Donald Glover & James Earl Jones Cast As Simba And Mufasa In New 'Lion King' Movie posted by Bossip - share 
Bossip previously reported that there is a live-action version of the Disney classic The Lion King coming to theaters. What we can now report is that both Simba and Mufasa have been cast and we couldn’t be happier at the choices. { "position1" : { "type" : "artist", "id" : 650282, "name" : "Childish Gambino" } } 
According to director Jon Favreau Simba will be played by… I just can’t wait to be king. #Simba pic.twitter.com/wUYKixMBJI — Jon Favreau (@Jon_Favreau) February 18, 2017 
Simba’s father, Mufasa, will rightly be played by the incomparable… Looking forward to working with this legend. #Mufasa pic.twitter.com/1LszbWrcYT — Jon Favreau (@Jon_Favreau) February 18, 2017 
We must admit, we did lie a lil’ bit. We said were happy for Donald Glover, and we are, but the question is, how does this affect the production of season 2 of "Atlanta"???? We NEEDS that.
